newsitem.title: UK: UK trade dept to support Nokia in Malaysia.
newsitem.headline: UK trade dept to support Nokia in Malaysia.

text.p: The UK Export Credit Guarantee Department said on Tuesday it would support an order won by Nokia Telecommunications Ltd to supply equipment for Malaysia's first personal communications network. The order to provide Sapura Digital Sdn Bhd of Malaysia is being financed by a loan worth 87.7 million ringgits($35.2 million) and is arranged by Standard Chartered Bank.
This is the first time ECGD has supported a loan denominated in ringgits.
The department said it was providing a guarantee against the political repayment risks of the loan which is funded by Standard Chartered Bank Malaysia Berhad of Kuala Lumpur.
ECGD is the UK's official export credit agency. Nokia Telecommunications Ltd is the UK subsidiary of Finland's Nokia Group.
